channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best Buy raises full-year profit guidance after earnings and revenue beat
item.description: Best Buy now expects to see full-year adjusted earnings per share in the range of $6.10 to $6.35, up from a prior range of $5.75 to $6.20.

item.title: Poletti: Nvidia CEO’s swagger isn’t enough to support the stock
5 things to know before the stock market opens Thursday
item.description: Here are the most important news items that investors need to start their trading day.

item.title: Yelp files antitrust suit against Google, claiming it stifles competition
Thursday's analyst calls: Cava gets a downgrade, video game maker to jump 20%
item.description: A fast-casual food chain and a video game maker were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Thursday.

item.title: Ford is the latest company to retreat from its DEI goals
Nvidia shares dip in premarket trade despite earnings beating estimates
item.description: Nvidia shares fell 4.5% in U.S. premarket trade on Thursday despite its fiscal second-quarter results beating estimates.

item.title: The early August financial-market meltdown could happen again — but even worse
Finland will soon bury nuclear waste in a geological tomb that’s built to last for 100,000 years
item.description: The pioneering project has been hailed as both a watershed moment for the long-term sustainability of nuclear energy and "a model for the entire world...

item.title: CrowdStrike earnings: Stock falls 4% despite assurances from execs
